description: This table contains audit information about the c-level info for imaging studies.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_END_DATES
columns.description: Audit information about the appointment end dates. The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_APPT_INFO.APPT_EXAM_END_DATE.

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_END_TIMES
columns.description: Audit information about the appointment end times.  The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_APPT_INFO.APPT_EXAM_END_TIME.
